Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-lad
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: bewisit’wa isheti bale shīfanochi yeẖonu zenibabawochimi yalubati sitiẖoni፡፡
yegeleba balebēti yeẖone k’init’atimi፡፡ bale melikami me‘āza k’it’elochimi (yalubati sitiẖoni)፡፡
(sewochina ganēnochi hoyi!) kegētachihumi ts’egawochi beyetinyawi tasitebabilalachihu
sewini inide shekila kemīk’ich’elech’eli derek’i ch’ik’a fet’erewi፡፡
yehuletu miširak’ochi gēta፤ yehuletu mi‘irabochimi gēta newi፡፡
(inidayiwaḥādu) bemekakelachewi garaji ālile፡፡ (ānidu banidu layi) weseni āyalifumi፡፡
inide garawochi ẖonewi bebaḥiri wisit’i yetešeruti tenishaleyochumi (tanikwawochi) ye’irisu nachewi፡፡
be’iriswa (bemidiri) layi yalewi hulu t’efī newi፡፡
yelik’inana yeligišina balebēti yeẖonewi yegētahi fītimi yik’erali፡፡ (āyit’efami)፡፡
besemayatina bemidiri wisit’i yaluti hulu yileminutali፡፡ beyek’enu hulu irisu bešira layi newi፡፡
inanite huleti kebadochi (sewochina ganēnochi) hoyi! le’inanite (mek’ot’at’eri) be’irigit’i inasibaleni፡፡
yeganēnina yesewi ch’ifirochi hoyi! kesemayatina kemidiri k’ebelēwochi mewit’atini bitichilu wit’u፡፡ besilit’ani iniji ātiwet’umi፡፡ (gini silit’ani yelachihumi)
behuletachihumi layi ke’isati nebelibali፣ ch’isimi yilakibachiḫwali፡፡ (huletachihumi) ātiriredumimi፡፡
semayimi betesenet’ek’echina inide ts’igēreda፣ inidetarebe k’oda beẖonechi gīzē፤ (ch’inik’uni mini āberetawi)፡፡
bezīyami k’eni sewimi janimi keḫat’ī’atu gena āyit’eyek’imi፡፡
keḥadīwochi bemilikitachewi yitawek’alu፡፡ ānatochachewinina ch’amawochachewinimi yiyazalu፡፡
yihichī yachī āmets’enyochi be’iriswa yasitebabilubati yeneberechiwi gehānemi nati (yibalalu)፡፡
be’iriswana bet’ami mok’ati beẖone fili wiha mekakeli yimelalesalu፡፡
begētawimi fīti mek’omini lefera sewi huleti genetochi āliluti፡፡
behuletu wisit’i yemīfesisu huleti minich’ochi ālilu፡፡
behuletu wisit’i kefirafirēwochi hulu huleti ‘ayinetochi (irit’ibina derek’i) ālilu፡፡
yewisit’i gusigusachewi kewefirami ḥāri beẖonu minit’afochi layi yetemechachu sīẖonu (yinifelasesalu)፡፡ yehuletumi genetochi firē (lelek’amī) k’iribi newi፡፡
bewisit’achewi kebefītachewi (kebalochachewi befīti) sewimi janimi yaligesesachewi ‘ayinochachewini (bebalochachewi layi) āsat’arīwochi (sētochi) ālilu፡፡
yebego šira waga bego iniji lēla newini
kehuletu genetochimi lēla huleti genetochi ālilu፡፡
kelimilamēyachewi yetenesa wede t’ik’ureti yazenebelu nachewi፡፡
bewisit’achewi t’ebaye melikamochi meliki wibochi (sētochi) ālilu፡፡
bedinikwanochi wisit’i yetech’egolu ye‘ayinochachewi t’ik’uretina nit’ati demak’i yeẖonu nachewi፡፡
bemīyaregerigu ārenigwadē minit’afochina bemīyamamiru sigajawochi layi yetedeladelu sīẖonu (yik’emet’alu)፡፡
yegirimana yemekiberi balebēti yeẖonewi gētahi simi tebareke፡፡
